testsuite.name: Operation Coverage (Suite)
testsuite.description: Percentage of API operations covered by all the test cases
testsuite.explanation: Total number of operations is 2 and covered is 2

testsuite.name: Parameter coverage
testsuite.description: Percentage of parameters in the API that are covered

runtime.name: Operation Coverage (Runtime Unique)
runtime.description: Percentage of test suite operations successfully covered (2xx) at runtime
runtime.explanation: Total number of test suite operations is 2 and successfully covered is 2

runtime.name: Operation Coverage (Runtime Instance-wise)
runtime.description: Percentage of test suite operation instances successfully covered (2xx) at runtime
runtime.explanation: Total number of test suite operations is 10 and successfully covered is 9

runtime.name: Output status code coverage
runtime.description: Percentage of status codes covered for all operations, as obtained in API responses
runtime.explanation: Total number of status codes in API is 2 and codes covered is 3

runtime.name: Parameter coverage
runtime.description: Percentage of executed parameters in the API that are successfully covered
